name: 7digital Android SDK
tagline: The 7digital Android SDK makes it easy to 7digital features to your Android app
body:
### 7digital Android SDK

The 7digital SDK simplifies access to features available in the 7digital API and makes it easy to add music charts and metadata, preview streams, purchasing and more to your Android app.

**Getting Started**

1. Register as a developer to get a key and secret at http://access.7digital.com/partnerprogram

2. Clone the repository, which includes a sample app

3. Change the appKey and appSecret in the Constants.java file to your own key and secret.

4. To use the SDK in your app, include the cloned repository as a module in Android Studio. Make sure to compile the 'sdk' module as a dependency.

5. Alternatively, a compiled .aar is available in the Releases tab of the GitHub page
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
